channel.title: Cloudflare Network Analytics on Security365 Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Cloudflare Network Analytics on Security365 Docs

item.title: Get started
item.description: Get started with Network Analytics RequirementsNetwork Analytics v2 requires the following: A Cloudflare Enterprise plan. Cloudflare Magic Transit or Spectrum. ​​ View the Network Analytics dashboard Log in to the Cloudflare dashboard External link icon Open external link and select an account that has access to Magic Transit or Spectrum. On the account’s Home page, navigate to Analytics > Network Analytics. ​​ Get Network Analytics data via API Use the GraphQL Analytics API to query data using the available Network Analytics v2 nodes.
